    • Classic HighlightsOur Vietnam classic highlights itineraries are designed to make the most out of your journey through Vietnam by featuring the very best of the country. By visiting iconic and must-see destinations, our highlights tours create a broad and all-encompassing picture of Vietnam while offering unique opportunities for in-depth cultural discovery along the way. For travellers looking to experience all that Vietnam has to offer, a classic highlights tour promises an unforgettable journey.

Sale!Featured

Oasis Bay Party Cruise 3D 2N

$179.00 $159.00

On this 3 Days and 2 Nights Halong Party Cruise you will spend a day exploring and enjoying the magnificence Halong Bay and one night on one of our famous Junk style party boats with activities including kayaking, swimming and boat jumping. The first night is party time where you can really let go and then you will spend one day and night at the incredible Freedom Island. Our own private island, Freedom has it all. Two beaches, modern accommodation, hammocks, volleyball court, snorkelling, kayaking, swimming, rock climbing. There really is something for everyone..! This cruise is sure to be one of the highlights of your Vietnam trip!

Categories: Backpacker Tours, Day Tours Hanoi, Halong Bay Cruises

  • Summary
  • Itinerary
  • Cruise Enquiry
  • Reviews (0)

Day 1 – Halong Party Cruise by Oasis Bay
7.45 – 8.15: Pick up at your hotel in the Old Quarter of Hanoi where we collect most of the people that will be your shipmates for the following 3 days and 2 nights of spectacular scenery along with fun. We will have a 3 ½ to 4 hour bus ride to Tuan Chau Harbour. The Party Cruise bus is comfortable and fully air conditioned so you can take the time to meet some of the other guests or get some sleep if you were out drinking late in Hanoi.
12.00 -12.30: Arrive at Tuan Chau Harbour for a 15 minute break before taking a ferry boat to the 3 Star Halong Party Cruise Junk.
12.30 -1.00: Check into your cabin put your bags down and then enjoy a real Vietnamese lunch while the boat begins to cruise majestically through Halong Bay. There is a magic or an energy that you feel when cruising through the Bay that is just lovely and amazing.
1.00 – 15.00: Passing by Stone Dog Islet, Incense Burner Islet, Fighting Cock Islet, Swan Isle, Duck Islet…
15.00 – 17.00: Spend at least two hours kayaking through the tunnel to explore the off the beaten track area of Frog Pond in the fairy land of Halong Bay.
17.00: Sunset Party Time with Boat Jumping and Swimming
18.15: Re-board the Party Cruise, take a shower, and relax
19.15: Evening meal in the dining room
20.30: Party Time till late

Day 2 – Halong Party Cruise by Oasis Bay
7.30: Wake to the sound of waves and seabirds, and see the beautiful sunrise in idyllic surroundings. Breakfast served with toast, eggs, tea and coffee.
9.30-11.30: Transferring to Cat Ba Island by bus and then onto a smaller boat to enjoy snorkelling, swimming, boat jumping and rock climbing in and around the Lan Ha Bay lagoon area. We will then head to the private beach and accommodation on Freedom Island.
12.00-13.00: Have lunch.
15.00-18.00: Playing football, volley ball on the beach, kayaking, table tennis and billiards in entertainment area.
19.00: Have dinner
20.00: Party On!

Day 3 – Halong Party Cruise by Oasis Bay
Wake to the sound of waves, seabirds and see the beautiful sunrise.
7.00: Breakfast served in the dining room.
8.00: Pack your things, settle your bill and leave Freedom Island
10.00: The Cruise will head back to Tuan Chau Harbour.
11.00 -12.30: Attend the Cooking demonstration and enjoy the last lunch on board with your new shipmates before you get back the bus to Hanoi
17.00: Arrive in Hanoi

 Included:

  • Full furnished deluxe cabin with A/C, hot water
  • All meals on board (02 lunches, 01dinner, 01 breakfast)
  • Complimentary morning tea and coffee
  • Complimentary mineral water
  • Welcome drink
  • Cookery demonstrations
  • Entrance and sightseeing fees
  • Kayaking
  • Music, exciting games
  • English speaking guide
  • Shuttle bus (within Hanoi old quarter)
  • Fruits and local wine party

Excluded:

  • Beverages
  • Personal expenses
  • All services and items not mentioned specifically in the list above.

Notes:

The price does not include any beverages on board. Halong Party Cruises has a fully licensed that stocks spirits, beers, soft drinks at the competitive price. There is strictly No BYO.
